titleStmt.title: The appollogie of the illustrious Prince Ernestus, Earle of Mansfield, &c. Wherein from his first entertainment, are layd open the occasions of his warres in Bohemia, Austria, and the Palatinate, with his faithfull seruice to the King of Bohemia. Translated out of the originall French coppie.
Apologie pour le tres-illustre seigneur, Ernéste conte de Mansfeld. English
titleStmt.author: S. W., fl. 1622.

titleStmt.title: The appollogie of the illustrious Prince Ernestus, Earle of Mansfield, &c. Wherein from his first entertainment, are layd open the occasions of his warres in Bohemia, Austria, and the Palatinate, with his faithfull seruice to the King of Bohemia. Translated out of the originall French coppie.
Apologie pour le tres-illustre seigneur, Ernéste conte de Mansfeld. English
titleStmt.author: S. W., fl. 1622.

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Apologie pour le tres-illustre seigneur, Ernéste conte de Mansfeld.
The imprint is false; printed in London by Edward Allde (STC).
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
